price: 12 Nous avons, en vérité, créé l’homme à partir d’une essence d’argile,
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن سُلَٰلَةٖ مِّن طِينٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā al-insāna min sulālatin min ṭīnin
